issues.description: Assignment specified 'npm install tsparticles' but tsparticles is not in package.json dependencies. Implementation uses CDN instead, which is functionally equivalent but deviates from explicit instructions.
The div has 'pointer-events-none' class which could prevent click interactions, but tsparticles handles its own events via fullScreen mode so this is acceptable.
Contains TODO comment for glow container styling - indicates incomplete work but not related to this assignment.

buildOutput: Unable to run dotnet build - dotnet SDK is not installed or not available in PATH on this system. The .csproj file appears valid with proper SDK configuration (net8.0, nullable enabled, required packages referenced). Manual build verification required.
